verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse:
Like a fire in the night, Who's flames reach and touch the sky
Burn within my soul and mind, 'Till are I see are Your eyes
Like the dawn takes back the light, Like Your Son brought back to life
Resurrect my soul's desire, To burn again with true love's fire
With true love's fire

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Lord God come awaken love
Come stir my soul to long for all You are
I'm desperate just to have more of Your heart
Come awaken love

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
'Cause I live to love You
Almighty God of love
And my desire is to know you
And give you all my heart

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Final Chorus:
Lord God come awaken love
Come stir my soul to long for all You are
I'm desperate just to have more of Your heart
Come awaken love
